attributes.action: bring MPs basic wages into line with the average UK national wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs receive a generous remuneration package several times the national average wage. The annual salary for a backbench MP is £60,277 plus generous allowances and expenses (Nov 2006). The average wage is under £25,000. Why should the average MP receive several times the pay of the average worker?
